name: Twisted Metal Soap
description:
This is a Twisted Metal like game about cars with guns demolishing each other within a set arena, seasoned with self-aware sense of humor. A story mode is available, that will throw you at each of the four arenas in turn, where you will have three lives to prove yourself worthy of seeing an ending for the chosen character. Each of the six characters' completion will contribute towards unlocking the seventh and the bonus content.

Keyboard and mouse are required to play this game. Windows 7 or higher, though Wine works as well. It is advised to turn on the frame limiter.

Если вы знаете Русский, рекомендую заодно скачать предоставленный русификатор, устанавливаемый через распаковку в папку - множество оборотов просто не удалось перевести.
